import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import './checkout.styles.scss'; import {CheckoutPageContainer, CheckoutHeaderContainer, HeaderBlockContainer, TotalContainer, WarningContainer} from './checkout.styles' const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => { return(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map((cartItem)=>( )) }
TOTAL: ${total}
*Please use the following test credit cart for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242
Use current month, e.x. - 02/21 and CVV - 123
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
